attributes.background:
Employees who have acted inappropriately towards minors mustn’t be given pay deals to avoid negative publicity for the Government.
State Pension is a UK right; pension packages & sweetheart deals aren’t. Rescind this money & use it to compensate child abuse survivors.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what you mean by "Rescind Gov-Paedophile pension-privileges, golden-parachutes & sweetheart-deals". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
